sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../../styles/product-card.css' import { Col } from 'reactstrap' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { CartActions } from '../../redux/Slice/CartSlice' const ProductCard = ({item}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const addToCart = () => { dispatch(CartActions.addItem( { id : item.id, productName : item.productName, price : item.price, image : item.imgUrl } )) } return (

{item.productName}

{item.category}
${item.price}
) } export default ProductCard
